original_text: War and famine have destroyed you. Both those terrible things have happened to you. Who feels sorry for you? Who is there to comfort you? War and famine have destroyed you. Both those terrible things have happened to you. Who feels sorry for you? Who is there to comfort you? War and famine have destroyed you. Both those terrible things have happened to you. Who feels sorry for you? Who is there to comfort you? War and famine have destroyed you. Both those terrible things have happened to you. Who feels sorry for you? Who is there to comfort you? War and famine have destroyed you. Both those terrible things have happened to you. Who feels sorry for you? Who is there to comfort you? War and famine have destroyed you.
korean_text: 이 두 가지 일이 네게 닥쳤으니 누가 너를 위하여 슬퍼하랴 곧 황폐와 멸망이요 기근과 칼이라 누가 너를 위로하랴

sentences.original_text: War and famine have destroyed you.
Both those terrible things have happened to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 둘 다 그 끔찍한 일들이 당신에게 일어났습니다.
